name: Sabotage
description: When another player plays an action card: Cancel that action card.

name: Direct Hit
description: After another player's unit uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE to cancel a hit produced by your units: Destroy that unit.

name: Direct Hit
description: After another player's unit uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE to cancel a hit produced by your units: Destroy that unit.

name: Direct Hit
description: After another player's unit uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE to cancel a hit produced by your units: Destroy that unit.

name: Direct Hit
description: After another player's unit uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE to cancel a hit produced by your units: Destroy that unit.

name: Skilled Retreat
description: At the start of a combat round: Move all of your ships from the active system into an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; your ground forces on planets in the active system that are not in a space area are removed. The space combat immediately ends.

name: Skilled Retreat
description: At the start of a combat round: Move all of your ships from the active system into an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; your ground forces on planets in the active system that are not in a space area are removed. The space combat immediately ends.

name: Morale Boost
description: At the start of a combat round: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Morale Boost
description: At the start of a combat round: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Morale Boost
description: At the start of a combat round: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Morale Boost
description: At the start of a combat round: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Shields Holding
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel up to 2 hits.

name: Shields Holding
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel up to 2 hits.

name: Shields Holding
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel up to 2 hits.

name: Experimental Battlestation
description: ACTION: Choose 1 non-home system other than the Mecatol Rex system that contains 1 of your space docks; that space dock uses SPACE CANNON 5 (x3) against ships in its system.

name: Flank Speed
description: After you activate a system: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Flank Speed
description: After you activate a system: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Flank Speed
description: After you activate a system: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Flank Speed
description: After you activate a system: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Fire Team
description: After your ground forces make combat rolls during a round of ground combat: Reroll each of your dice that did not produce a hit.

name: Emergency Repairs
description: At the start of a combat round: Repair all of your units that have SUSTAIN DAMAGE in the active system.

name: Emergency Repairs
description: At the start of a combat round: Repair all of your units that have SUSTAIN DAMAGE in the active system.

name: Bunker
description: At the start of ground combat on a planet you control: Apply -4 to the result of each of your opponent's combat rolls during the first round of ground combat.

name: Courageous to the End
description: After 1 of your ships is destroyed during a space combat: Roll 2 dice. For each result equal to or greater than 8, your opponent must choose and destroy 1 of their ships.

name: Courageous to the End
description: After 1 of your ships is destroyed during a space combat: Roll 2 dice. For each result equal to or greater than 8, your opponent must choose and destroy 1 of their ships.

name: Disable
description: ACTION: Choose 1 of your opponent's PDS in a system that is adjacent to a system that contains 1 or more of your ships; exhaust that PDS.

name: Ghost Ship
description: ACTION: Place 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains a wormhole and does not contain other players' ships.

name: Fighter Prototype
description: At the start of the first round of a space combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your fighters' combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Focused Research
description: After you research a technology: You may spend 4 trade goods to research 1 additional technology.

name: Frontline Deployment
description: ACTION: Place 3 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

name: Ghost Squad
description: At the start of ground combat on a planet that contains your infantry: Remove up to 2 of your infantry from that planet; at the end of combat, return those infantry to that planet.

name: Industrial Initiative
description: ACTION: Gain 1 trade good for each industrial planet you control.

name: Industrial Initiative
description: ACTION: Gain 1 trade good for each industrial planet you control.

name: Insubordination
description: ACTION: Remove 1 token from another player's fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements.

name: Intercept
description: After your opponent declares a retreat during a space combat: Cancel that retreat.

name: Intercept
description: After your opponent declares a retreat during a space combat: Cancel that retreat.

name: Lost Star Chart
description: ACTION: Choose 1 system that contains a wormhole; during this movement, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole.

name: Maneuvering Jets
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel 1 hit assigned to 1 of your non-fighter ships.

name: Maneuvering Jets
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel 1 hit assigned to 1 of your non-fighter ships.

name: Maneuvering Jets
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Cancel 1 hit assigned to 1 of your non-fighter ships.

name: Mining Initiative
description: ACTION: Gain trade goods equal to the resource value of 1 planet you control.

name: Plague
description: ACTION: Choose 1 planet that is controlled by another player; roll 1 die for each infantry on that planet. For each result of 6 or greater, destroy 1 of those infantry.

name: Public Disgrace
description: When another player selects a strategy card during the Strategy Phase: That player must select a different strategy card instead.

name: Rally
description: ACTION: Place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.

name: Reparations
description: After a player gains control of a planet you controlled: That player gives you 2 trade goods.

name: Repeal
description: After an agenda is revealed: Discard that agenda and reveal 1 new agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this new agenda instead.

name: Rise of a Messiah
description: After the agenda phase: Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on each planet you control.

name: Scramble Frequency
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Your opponent cannot use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE during this combat round.

name: Signal Jamming
description: ACTION: Choose a non-home system other than the Mecatol Rex system that contains or is adjacent to 1 of your ships; place a command token from another player's reinforcements in that system.

name: Spy
description: ACTION: Choose 1 player; look at that player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

name: Summit
description: After the Status Phase has ended: Gain 2 command tokens.

name: Tactical Bombardment
description: ACTION: Choose 1 planet in a system that contains your units that have BOMBARDMENT; for each of those units, roll 1 die. For each result equal to or greater than the unit's BOMBARDMENT value, destroy 1 infantry on that planet.

name: Unexpected Action
description: ACTION: Remove 1 of your command tokens from the game board and return it to your reinforcements.

name: Upgrade
description: ACTION: Choose 1 non-fighter, non-infantry unit in a system that contains your space dock; replace that unit with a unit of the same type from your reinforcements.

name: War Machine
description: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your space docks: Use PRODUCTION of 1 of your space docks in that system, reducing the combined cost of the produced units by 4.

name: War Machine
description: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your space docks: Use PRODUCTION of 1 of your space docks in that system, reducing the combined cost of the produced units by 4.

name: Confusing Legal Text
description: When an agenda card is being voted on: Swap all 'For' votes with all 'Against' votes before resolving the outcome.

name: Construction Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to 2 times the number of structures you control.

name: Diplomacy Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to the number of other players' command tokens in systems you control.

name: Leadership Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to the number of command tokens in your reinforcements.

name: Politics Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to the number of planets you control.

name: Technology Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to 2 times the number of technologies you own.

name: Trade Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to the number of trade goods you have.

name: Warfare Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to the number of non-fighter ships you have on the game board.

name: Imperial Rider
description: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast additional votes equal to your victory points.

name: Bribery
description: After the speaker reveals an agenda: Spend any number of trade goods. For each trade good spent, cast 1 additional vote for any outcome.

name: Infiltrate
description: After you activate a system: You may place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet in the active system that contains 1 or more of your units.

name: Parley
description: After a player activates a system that contains your units: Return your units in the active system to a system that contains 1 or more of your planets.

name: Cripple Defenses
description: ACTION: Choose 1 planet; destroy each PDS on that planet.

name: Lucky Shot
description: At the start of a round of space combat: Destroy 1 of your opponent's non-fighter ships.

name: In the Silence of Space
description: After you activate a system: 1 of your ships in the active system may move through systems that contain other players' ships.

name: Confound
description: When another player plays an action card, other than Sabotage: Cancel that action card.

name: Blitz
description: After you activate a system: Each of your non-fighter ships in the active system may use their ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE ability.

name: Counterstroke
description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may activate a system that contains 1 or more of that player's units. You may resolve a tactical action in that system.

name: Divert Funding
description: ACTION: Return 1 of your technologies to your player area. Then research 1 technology.

name: Forward Supply Base
description: After you gain control of a planet: Gain 3 trade goods.

name: Master Plan
description: After another player performs a strategic action: Resolve the primary ability of that strategy card.

name: Harness Energy
description: ACTION: Gain 1 command token and 3 trade goods.

name: Veto
description: When an agenda is revealed: Discard that agenda.

name: Veto
description: When an agenda is revealed: Discard that agenda.

name: Ancient Burial Sites
description: ACTION: Exhaust 1 cultural planet you control to gain 3 trade goods.

name: Assassinate Representative
description: After an agenda is revealed: Choose 1 player; that player cannot vote on this agenda.

name: Reactor Meltdown
description: ACTION: Destroy 1 space dock in a non-home system.

name: Solar Flare
description: After you activate a system: During this tactical action, other players' units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your ships.

name: Waylay
description: At the start of an invasion: Remove all of your opponent's ground forces from 1 planet in the active system.

name: Plague
description: ACTION: Choose 1 planet that is controlled by another player; roll 1 die for each infantry on that planet. For each result of 6 or greater, destroy 1 of those infantry.

name: Uprising
description: ACTION: Exhaust 1 non-home planet controlled by another player. Then, gain trade goods equal to its resource value.
